sense.gloss: to cling to, to hang onto
to rely on, to depend on
to cling to, to rely on
to cling to, to depend on, to embrace, to hug
to be hot on a person's heels

k_ele.e: わらにもすがる思いで
ワラにもすがる思いで

r_ele.r: わらにもすがるおもいで
ワラにもすがるおもいで

sense.gloss: hoping against hope, desperately hoping, as a last hope
to grasp at straws, to resort to desperate measures
to grasp at straws, to resort to desperate measures

k_ele.e: 杖に縋るとも人に縋るな

r_ele.r: つえにすがるともひとにすがるな

sense.gloss: don't be a burden to others, lean on your cane, but don't lean on others

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑行↑↓い↓かせまいとして↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑縋↑↓すが↓った。
sdata.e: She held on to me to prevent me from going.
